Blog.post: Well just decided to make a blog site. nothing much going on now. actually i dont have much time to add anything since my girlfreind is on her way over and we are going to eat some pizza and watch a movie. Maybe i will post better stuff later
well i was out there before it started raining and got about 40 miles in. It was pretty fun. I even got to have lunch with sticker john. yay

Well the cable modem wasnt working very consistly, it would pretty much only work at night for some reason. But the comcast guy came out and fixed it. There was a loose connection on the box up the street. So yay, i have internet again.

Well my bro said he had an extra ticket to the DMB concert last night so i was able to get that for free too. It almost seems like all the free stuff is going to cancel out all the expensive crap i have to buy for my motorcycle.
Well, i just got off the phone with Brian and he said i should get my parts soon. Hopefully today or tomorrow, then my truck will be all fixed and my T/a will be running better. Yay!

yeah i suck with human, i am not sure what it is, but i seem so slow with them. *sigh* and they seems so cool too. I think they ahve the best units in the game with the spellbreakers and their starting tower is cool too. I think they just take too much micro and i am not that good at that.

Well, this weekend was great, i got tons of free stuff. -tickets to O's game on friday -tickets to O's game on Saturday -Free Slurpee (7/11 birthday) -Free Dog Cage -Free Wine at Olive garden -Free lunch from nick and gundi and i think i got something else too, but i cant remember. It was a pretty good weekend i must say.
I went to the game yesterday at 7:35p and the one today at 4:35p we lost yesterday, but won today. yay.
Well i got off my lazy butt and went out and fixed/ cleand my bike. Now it is working alright and should pass state inspection, but it sure does look pretty now.
Arugh, cant sleep tonight. I played some wc3 and got the tinker hero. i think he blows now and will never choose him again. I guess i can try the sleep thing again now though. Good night.
i got my motorcycle back from the shop today. $539 worth of repairs and it still wont pass state inspection. arugh.

I went and saw that with my girl tonight. I thought it was really good, but she didnt much care for it. We saw Spiderman 1 right before it on HBO so we had a good feeling for the plot. I wont give anything away since so many people read this site. HA HA HA

I went down the the lake front and watched the fireworks. They werent that grat, but better then nothing. Also, i went away this weekend to my girlfriend's grandmother's house and had a fun time. Even went crabbing and ate some crabs. yum yum

I am now using Firefox as my browser: urlLink Download here I think i like it, it seems a bit slower then IE, but then again i hacked my IE to make it download more images faster. At least Firefox is less problematic to hackers and expolits and i am not supporting microsoft.

Well trying to find the solution to my cable modem lock up lead me to this thread: urlLink Cable modem Lock up Problems and now i think i am either going to try to talk to tech support or buy a new modem like the motorolla surboard sb5100. maybe i will talk to nick and see whats going on. Any other suggestions on a good cable modem that doesnt lock up after heavy use?

well fun times with paypal, i had money sent to a different email address, then i signed up that email address under a new account istead of adding the email to my existing account now i gotta do a bunch of shit cause i messed up... ARUGH!!!

I was in this random team 2v2. it was one of those that who ever had the expos would win. well we got cut off and the other team had taurens and shamen. so i massed some chimms and won it at the end. hardcore stuff. i was excitted. yeah, i have no life ;)

This is cool. www.bugmenot.com BugMeNot.com was created as a mechanism to quickly bypass the login of web sites that require compulsory registration and/or the collection of personal/demographic information (such as the New York Times).
I didnt even relize it is july already. Well Happy july to everyone =)
other people have cool blogs and mine sucks. any suggestions to make it better? any how do i add pics to my blog entries?
Went to work today for like an hour. got bored so i decided to come home and see how my ebay auction did. now i am eatting pizza again and i think i am about to play some video games
